from bisect import bisect
from statistics import mean


def calculate_grade(scores):
    return 'FDCBA'[bisect([60, 70, 80, 90], mean(scores))]

import statistics

def calculate_grade(scores):
    mean = statistics.mean(scores)
    if mean >= 90: return "A"
    if mean >= 80: return "B"
    if mean >= 70: return "C"
    if mean >= 60: return "D"
    return "F"
